title: My Own Style!
detail_text: <:th_ch0205/>Hello~! What’s up, you said you need me for something today?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0002/>You see, I was thinking that I should thank you for the other day, Ai<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0205/>Thank me for the other day?? Did Ai do something?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0002/>You dressed up Nozomi with your own style, didn’t you<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0205/>Aah, yeah, that happened! Geez, Eli, you were so surprised that you let out a scream~ Ahahaha. Ai thought a Gyaru-ish style would fit Nozomi. Ai felt accomplished after that~<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0002/>Fufu, that’s why.... Today, I thought, why don’t I dress you up with my own style. Alright, first, please change into this♡<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0205/>Uwaaaaaaaah!! Ballet makeup is really amaaaaaaaaaaazing!!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0002/>Umm, you can be a little bit more surprised, you know....?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0205/>Ai is surprised! But this is much more fun than that~~!!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
